title: Investigate Community Forum Spam Attack
description: A game's official community forum is hit by a large number of spam posts from newly created accounts.

tasks.description: Identify the spam posts and the accounts that created them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a pattern of posts with malicious links from accounts created within the last hour.

tasks.description: Run a script to bulk-delete all posts and ban all accounts originating from the spammer's IP block.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cleans the forum and bans the spam accounts.

tasks.description: Temporarily enable stricter posting requirements for new accounts to prevent a recurrence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the forum settings to require email verification for new posters.
